lead_item.heading: Web publishing, streamlined
lead_item.description: AccuEdits is quick, stylish, and gives your team all the tools they need to handle large amounts of content efficiently.

highlights_items.heading: Flexibility for developers
highlights_items.text: Anything you can do in PHP or Drupal, you can do in AccuEdits.

highlights_items.heading: Creative control for editors
highlights_items.text: Editors can structure and publish content the way they want to without a developer.

highlights_items.heading: Frontend freedom for designers
highlights_items.text: The simple templating system gives you precise control over style.
